Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.

{XML_SPECIES_KIRKO@RACE@DESCRIPTION_SHORT}[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet][sand]Starting Bonus:[/sand] 2 [hyperlink,000003570000056A]Emergent[/hyperlink] units.[/bullet][bullet][sand]Long-Term Bonus:[/sand] -25% [hyperlink,000003AC000000D4]Unit Upkeep[/hyperlink] for Tier I + II units[/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,0000039E0000000E]Bio[/hyperlink] Weapons Group[/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,0000039E00000011]Psi[/hyperlink] Weapons Group[/bullet][bullet]Rapid population growth and large armies[/bullet][bullet]Biological units with good melee capability[/bullet][bullet]Racial Abilities: [hyperlink,0000034500000AB6]Swarm Shields[/hyperlink] and faster [hyperlink,000003AC0000030F]Regeneration[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletList]

{XML_SPECIES_KIRKO@RACE@DESCRIPTION_SHORT}[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet][sand]初始加成：[/sand] 2 个[hyperlink,000003570000056A]新生幼虫[/hyperlink]单位。[/bullet][bullet][sand]长期加成：[/sand]1 阶和 2 阶单位 -25%[hyperlink,000003AC000000D4]单位维持消耗[/hyperlink][/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,0000039E0000000E]生化[/hyperlink]武器组[/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,0000039E00000011]灵能[/hyperlink]武器组[/bullet][bullet]人口增长迅速，部队规模庞大[/bullet][bullet]近战能力优秀的生物单位[/bullet][bullet]种族技能：[hyperlink,0000034500000AB6]族群护盾[/hyperlink]和更快的[hyperlink,000003AC0000030F]再生[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletList]
The {text} inserts the DESCRIPTION_SHORT text below.
Through rapid evolution, the [hyperlink,0000039E00000017]Kir'Ko[/hyperlink] seek to restore what was broken and will find retribution for the terrible fate that has befallen them.
[hyperlink,0000039E00000017]奇尔寇[/hyperlink]在飞速的进化中希望恢复支离破碎的事物，并惩罚降临于它们的可怕命运。
A settlement is a small independent colony that might join you if you have enough influence.
定居点是小型的独立殖民地，如果你拥有足够的影响力，定居点可能会加入你的势力。

Migrate the population of this colony to Kir'Ko. The colony will become a Kir'Ko colony.[br/][br/][fireCol]By migrating the population, {PopulationDeath} of the colonists of the colony will be killed.[/fireCol] [br/][br/]You receive:[br/][fireCol]{Reputation} Reputation[br/]{RaceRelation} Race Relation with the {STR_raceName}[/fireCol]
将殖民地的居民移民为奇尔寇，之后该殖民地将变为奇尔寇殖民地。[br/][br/][fireCol]迁移人口后，该殖民地 {PopulationDeath} 的移住民将会死亡。[/fireCol][br/][br/]你获得：[br/][fireCol]{Reputation} 声望[br/]与{STR_raceName}的种族关系 {RaceRelation}[/fireCol]
Colony is currently being migrated to a Kir'Ko population. Process will complete in [INT_duration].
殖民地正迁移为奇尔寇殖民地，将于 [INT_duration] 后完成。
Are you sure you want to migrate this colony to a Kir'Ko colony?
确定要将该殖民地移民为奇尔寇殖民地？

“The short slithering bugs known as Emergents are the easiest to destroy, but they are crafty and voracious. Our guardsmen struggle to keep them from infesting our underground stores. Though relatively slow, they chew and tunnel below the surface of our settlement. Their bodies are in a state of constant metamorphosis, thus the chemicals they exude are noxious. It is not uncommon to happen upon group of them in burrows ready to vomit gobs of toxic sludge on any that wander too close to where they feed.”— Professor R. Lin’l “Bugman” Bunson, “RV-123S: Seti Alpha Outpost Recordings”
“这种被称为新生幼虫的蛇行小虫虽然十分容易被杀死，但它们十分狡猾并且食欲旺盛。我们的守卫疲于应对它们持续不断地对我们地下储备的侵害。尽管速度较慢，但它们可以在我们定居点下方挖掘隧道前行。它们的身体处于不断变化的状态之中，释放出的化学物质具有毒性。任何靠近它们进食点的东西都会被它们喷上一团剧毒的呕吐物，这种情况并不罕见。”- R.林“昆虫人”邦森教授，“RV-123S：赛提阿尔法星前哨记录”

“The expedition proceeded without a hitch, until a flying Kir’Ko bug spied the convoy. We sniped the first, easily blasting it out of the sky. Despite my objections, the captain thought we could continue unnoticed. That’s when they swarmed. Although there were dozens of targets, together their strange, oppressive, insectoid minds screamed in our heads making them harder to hit. Men panicked, fleeing in all directions. The only reason I survived was that I hit my head on an ammo box hatch and was trapped therein.”— Mah Reg’Nib, Observer Officiate, “RV-772X: Nectar Run: The Price of Power”

“一路一来，探险行动都没有遇到什么问题，直到一只飞行的奇尔寇虫子发现了我们的车队。我们很轻松地就将第一只虫子从天上打了下来。尽管我百般劝阻，队长依旧认为我们能够继续前进且不被任何人发现。突然，虫群蜂拥而至。尽管它们只有几十只，但它们诡异而压迫的类昆虫思维仿佛在我们的脑海中发出一阵阵尖啸，使我们难以击中它们。人们惊慌失措，四散而逃。我之所以能够活下来，是因为我不小心撞到了一个弹药箱，然后被困在了里面。”- 玛·瑞格尼布，观察者长官：“RV-772X：花蜜奔跑：力量的代价”
Edit: added comma after "first", after "strange" and after "oppressive" Edit: removed extra space before "Despite"

“We are Frenzied. Branded as worker tools, our claws thirst for reaping. We work for our mindless mother. We are not them. We work until our vanished Queen returns. She calls from the Empty. They think she died. The earth’s fertile wealth will feed our broken. We are strongest in the true swarm. We follow our forgotten purpose. We fight those who exiled our Queen. Too long we worked for them; now we fight. They desire sweet nectar, we’ll give them bile. We are Frenzied.” (message repeats)— Kir’Ko Interrogator Translation Unit: Translation Errors, “RV-1457D: The Carapace Broken”

“我们是锐爪狂虫，虽然被刻上了工人的烙印，但我们的爪子渴望收割。我们为愚蠢的主母工作。但我们和他们不同。我们一直工作，直到我们消失的女王回归。我们听到了她在虚空中的呼喊。他们都认为她死了。肥沃的土壤能够填满我们的缺失。我们是真正的虫群中最强大的存在。我们追寻着我们遗忘的目标。我们与那些驱逐了我们女皇的人战斗。我们已经为他们工作太久了；现在，我们将发起反击。他们渴望甜美的花蜜，我们将给予他们愤怒。我们就是锐爪狂虫。”-（信息不断重复）- 奇尔寇审讯翻译单位：翻译错误，“RV-1457D：甲壳破裂”

“My worker bugs are defective! Hidden Kir’Ko are skulking about the plantation, their wings like cloaks. Bugbots aren’t intelligent, are they? Max says he saw one in a clearing, then it vanished in a cornfield. Max says they carry weapons. How can that be? All our rifles are accounted for. Max thinks they grow their own. Preposterous! What could they want? We fed the bugbots as prescribed. Yesterday, Max disappeared in a thick fog. Now the bugbots won’t work. I’m filing a grievance. I demand compensation!”— Colony Director Borwin Pomperflounce, “Star Alliance Frontier Anomalies, RV-004D: Terratech Biomechanical Corporate Liabilities”

“我的工虫有问题！影踪灵虫躲藏在种植园的各处，它们的翅膀如同斗篷一样。虫子没有智力，不是吗？马克思说他曾在空地上看见过一只，但它很快就在麦田里消失了。马克思说它们都带着武器，这怎么可能？我们所有的步枪可都是记录在案的，但马克思认为它们的武器是它们自己长出来的。这可真是荒唐！它们想要什么？我们一直在按照规定喂食这些虫子。昨天，马克思在一片浓雾中消失了。今天，那些虫子也不工作了。我要写投诉信，我要求赔偿！”- 殖民地主管鲍尔文·珀姆佩弗洛恩斯，“星际联盟边界异常，RV-004D：泰拉科技生物机械企业责任”

“It spoke through my daughter’s mouth, that hovering insect known as a ‘Transcendent’. It spoke of slavery and revenge, about taking back what was theirs. Our strongest fought back. They died breaking a hole through their forces for us to escape. I saw how gashes inflicted on bugs ripped spontaneously across the Transcendent, as if it shared their pain. Wounds closed within seconds of being inflicted. The floating bug unleashed a barrage of pain into our minds. Grown men cried incoherently. Those who could, fled in all directions.”— Joshu Dinarstem, RV-1499H, “Septinium Colony Massacre”

“那只浮在半空正通过我女儿的嘴巴向我说话的虫子被称为“超然灵虫”。它提到了奴役与复仇，说要夺回原本属于它们的东西。我们中最强壮的人发起了反击，以他们的生命为代价为我们冲出了一条逃跑的缺口。我发现当其他虫子被撕裂时，超然灵虫的身上也会出现伤口，仿佛它们正分享着痛苦。但它身上的伤口几秒钟之后便痊愈了，这只漂浮的虫子向我们的大脑释放了一阵痛苦，成年男子语无伦次地尖叫着。那些还能动的人无一不落荒而逃。”- 乔舒·迪纳斯特姆，RV-1499H，“赛普提尼姆殖民地大屠杀”
Edit: "slavery, revenge; about" -> "slavery and revenge, about"

“Rory is incoherent. Now and then he speaks. He witnessed a living nightmare. The other patients corroborate his story. A tentacled creature ripped through their unit. None of their minds survived. They weep uncontrollably. They feel guilt. Shame like they made a terrible mistake. He shrieks about its incessant focused hatred. I saw the aftermath of those who didn’t survive. I thought no death could be worse. Their minds splattered as though their thoughts were so terrible their heads exploded. Now I see they were the lucky ones. My patients are all tormented.”— Nurse Rachel Greene, “RV-1799H: Observations of The Fallen”

“罗里语无伦次地不知道在说些什么，他有一句没一句地说起他亲眼看见的梦魇，其他的病人也证实了他故事的真实性。他说一种长着触手的生物袭击了他们的部队，没有任何人的思想幸免于难。他们不受控制地抽泣，他们感觉到了愧疚和耻辱，仿佛自己犯下了某种滔天的罪行。不断汇集的仇恨使他尖叫了出来。我曾经目睹过那些没能活下来之人的惨状，也许没有比那更加惨烈的死法了。他们脑袋炸裂开来，仿佛他们的思维太过可怕而变得支离破碎。不过现在我明白其实他们才是真正幸运的人，因为我的病人仍然在痛苦中受尽折磨。”- 蕾切尔·格里尼护士，“RV-1799H：观察逝者”

“We first observed what we thought might be some kind of Kir’Ko cattle lumbering slowly in the jungle scrub. We kept a safe distance and remained concealed, until Ensign Jakobbe thought it might be fun to harass one with his targeting scope to see what might happen. Its long abdomen curled over its armored center, its rear sprouting like a hellish flower. A globule sailed over the ravine, splattering in our vicinity. Acrid gas burned our eyes. Jakobbe was blinded. I fled as the cover exploded around us.”— Mah Reg’Nib, Observer Officiate, “RV-771X: Nectar Run: The Price of Power”

“我们第一次见到它们的时候，还以为是某种在丛林矮木中缓慢前行的奇尔寇牲畜。我们一直与其保持着安全距离并且隐藏着行踪。雅各布少尉觉得用自己的瞄准镜骚扰一下应该会很有趣，他想看看会发生什么。结果，它长长的腹部弯至了它坚硬的身体中心，尾部如同一朵地狱之花绽放开来。一个球体穿过了峡谷，落在了我们身旁。刺鼻的气体灼烧了我们的眼睛，瞬间弄瞎了雅各布的眼睛。当我逃跑时，我们周围的掩体全部炸裂开来。”- 玛·瑞格尼布，“RV-771X：花蜜奔跑：力量的代价”
Edit: removed dash after "scope" Edit: butt -> rear

“We’ve made a grave strategic error, letting these “Ravenous” survive. When the troops finally mustered the courage to attack one, it had already rampaged through an assortment of fortifications and colony facilities. The question that plagued me: where were the bodies of the fallen colonists? They had all disappeared. From samples, I recognize now the amalgam of biogenetic blueprints consisting of both juggernaut and biomatter incubators. These aren’t just war machines, they were the colonists. They consumed biomass to produce progeny. Now we face an army of larval Kir’Ko.”— Professor R. Lin’l “Bugman” Bunson, “RV-122S: Seti Alpha Outpost Recordings”

“我们犯下了一个致命的战略错误，那就是让那些“贪婪暴虫”活了下来。当士兵们终于鼓起勇气向其中一只发起进攻时，它已经摧毁了无数的防御工事和殖民地设施。有一个问题一直困扰着我：那些死去移住民的尸体都去哪了？为什么全都消失了？从样本中，我总算知道了，这个生物基因蓝图混合物不仅是一只庞然巨物，还带有生物质孵化器。它们不仅是战争机器，它们也是移住民。它们会消耗死者的生物质来孵化后代。现在我们将面对一支奇尔寇幼虫大军。”- R.林“昆虫人”邦森教授，“RV-122S：赛提阿尔法星前哨记录”

“Untethered to the ground, the armored dragonfly-like bug spotted us easily. The Engulfers are well equipped for air-to-air battle. Our vain cries for air support ended in columns of black smoke all around us. Our ground fire did little against its heavily armored shell. It retaliated by lobbing bombs of corrosive neurotoxins upon our battlements. Men fell all around me. Had I not mistakenly backed into a well and fallen out of its reach, I suppose I would not have lived to record this encounter. Still it haunts me.”— Mah Reg’Nib, Observer Officiate, “RV-771X: Nectar Run: The Price of Power”

“这种外形类似蜻蜓的装甲飞虫既可以轻松地在空中监视我们，也可以使用身上精良的武器在空中与我们作战。我们呼叫的空中支援最后化作了一团又一团围绕在我们身边的黑烟。我们的地面火力无法对它们的坚硬外壳造成伤害。它们还会朝我们的城墙投射腐蚀性的神经毒素炸弹作为报复。周围的士兵不断倒下。如果不是我不小心退入了一口井中并躲开了它的攻击范围，我想我根本没有机会记录下这次遭遇。直至今日，这段回忆仍然是我的噩梦。”- 玛·瑞格尼布，“RV-771X：花蜜奔跑：力量的代价”

“When Harbingers come we’ll walk with arms interlocked with arms, or legs, or tentacles. It will be glorious. They consume the disbelieving and form Kir’Ko children that are perfectly obedient. My wife was a disbeliever, but she’s at peace now. Reborn as one of them. They can level armies with their will, and at their behest, we all fight with the enhanced power of unity its Guiding Hand gives us—a unity that CORE never achieved. You are afraid now, but when it comes, you will welcome it.”— Ketch Hawkins, “RV-1775H: Ravings of Rescued Colonists”

“当先兆王虫来临时，我们将手挽着手，或者手挽着脚，或者手挽着触须前行。那将极其光荣。它们吃掉那些心存怀疑之人，塑造出完全服从的奇尔寇后代。我的妻子就是一名怀疑者，但她现在已经平静下来了，成为了它们的一部分而获得了重生。它们能够凭借意志消灭军队，在它们的命令下，我们奋勇作战。它的指引之手将给予我们无比强大的团结之力，而这种团结核心永远无法达成。现在，你可能会感到害怕，但等到那一刻来临之时，你将会欣然拥抱。”- 凯奇·霍金斯，“RV-1775H：获救移住民的胡言乱语”

“They’re called Abyssians, and I’m telling you our walls won’t hold against them. You’ve seen their colonies, those solid cement-like tiers one upon another. How do you think they were formed? We should be fleeing. Our forces are insufficient to hold back the swarm. The Abyssians will break through our defenses and the swarm will do the rest. Get your men out. Leave it. They’re tunneling into the reserve chambers as we speak. If you care about these colonists at all, you’ll get them out now!”— Professor R. Lin’l “Bugman” Bunson, “RV-120S: Seti Alpha Outpost Recordings”

“它们被称为深渊幽鬼，而且我还要告诉你，我们的城墙没法抵挡住它们。你见过它们的殖民地，那些如水泥一样坚固的阶梯相互堆叠，你以为它们是怎么构成的？我们应该逃跑。我们的部队无法抵挡虫群。深渊幽鬼会突破我们的防线，而虫群将完成剩下的杀戮。带着你的人离开这里，快点。在我们说话的时候，它们正打通隧道通往你们的储备室。如果你真的在乎这些移住民，就立刻带他们离开这里！”- R.林“虫人”邦森教授，“RV-120S：赛提阿尔法星前哨记录”

“It’s as if fish hide there. We took a trawler into bug-claimed waters. Soon our nets couldn’t hold the catch. That’s when a giant water bug surfaced beside the ship. At first, I thought it wanted a cut, so we threw fish at it. It raised up and sprayed the net reel with some kind of cement, and the engines seized. It’s crushing claws cracked the hull of my ship like a walnut in a nutcracker. We all probably would’ve drowned, but the bug swam us back to port. So, I say bugs are alright.”— Leenad Falk, “RV-6678E: Fisherman’s Tales”

“我们乘着渔船进入了被虫子占领的水域，鱼儿似乎全都藏在那里。没过多久，我们的渔网就被撑满了。突然，一只巨大的水虫从我们渔船旁边冒了出来。起初，我以为它只是想分一杯羹，所以我们扔了几条鱼给它。但它突然跃起，向我们的卷网机吐出了某种类似水泥的东西，接着引擎便停止了运转。它坚硬的爪子撕扯着我们的船只，就好像被胡桃钳夹住的核桃一样。我们本该全都会被淹死，但这只虫子却将我们送回了港口。所以要说我的话，虫子也并不是那么坏嘛。”- 里纳德·法尔克，“RV-6678E：渔夫传说”
Edit: changed present tense text to past tense

“We found a mind in the Depths. Have you heard her forlorn cry? Her powers called us to the lonely shore like a torch beneath the water on a night with no moon. She is a reflection of our Beloved. She is the Deep One. Her carapace is strong. She is not our lost Queen, but she remembers her. She is an ancient sister. She pities us. The oppressors hold their breath refusing to breathe the air when she plunges into their thoughts. They drown in the depths of her mind.”— Nek’nek-Vik’vik-Kit’kikit, “RV-2398D: Words with Echoes”
“我们在深渊中发现了一种思绪。你听到她凄凉的叫声了吗？她的力量就像是没有月光的黑夜中伫立在水面上的火把，将我们引到了一片幽静的海岸。她化成了我们所爱之人，她就是深渊古兽。她的甲壳非常结实。虽然她不是我们失去的女皇，但她还记得她，她是来自古代的姐妹。她怜悯我们。当她进入那些压迫者的脑中时，他们连呼吸都不敢。”- Nek’nek-Vik’vik-Kit’kikit，“RV-2398D：回荡的声音”
Hiveguard are the Kir'Ko defense turrets.
蜂巢护卫是奇尔寇的防御炮塔。

Peace be upon you, Swarmherald of the Unshackled Kir'Ko. I do not know how your insectoid emotions work, but let me say that wrath and vengeance do not lead to salvation. The empire that enthralled your kind lies in ruins, while you have regained your freedom. Everything happens for a reason. Shape your own future and don’t look back in anger. May your swarm bring light to this world.
愿和平伴你左右，挣脱了镣铐的奇尔寇族群使者。虽然我不理解你们类昆虫的思维，但我还是要说，怒火与复仇无法带来救赎。曾经奴役你们的帝国已经变成了废墟，你们也重获了自由。万事万物皆有因。专注于未来，不要以愤怒执着于过去。愿你的虫群能够为这个世界带来光明。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

VO: Empress Carminia - Female
Edit: Kirko -> Kir'Ko
These Kir'Ko are called upon in times of need and the Hive is in need of protection.
这些奇尔寇将在需要时以及蜂巢需要保护时得到号召。
